Seabridge is situated on approximately 10 acres of gracefully elevated land overlooking the ocean on the northwest shore of New Providence Island, The Bahamas. The townhomes of Phase One are currently being offered. Phase Two will consist of a 6-story mid-rise with condominiums and penthouses. Phase Three will consist of additional townhomes, multi-story buildings with condominiums and penthouses. The topographical elements on the site afford significant and rare expansive ocean views. Intimately scaled pools and water features throughout the property will accentuate the feeling of a lush, tropical oasis and evoke a sense of serenity. This is Seabridge.
